content: square chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 into the corner along the side 3 double_crochet chain 1 into the spaces between each of the 3 double_crochet shells from the previous round when you reach the next corner 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 along the side 3 double_crochet chain 1 into the spaces between each of the 3 double_crochet shells from the previous round repeat 2 more times slip_stitch into the top of the chain 3 fasten_off joining the rest of the squares all of the squares have either two corners and one side picture 1 or three corners and two sides picture 2 that are joined onto the blanket it depends on their location in the blanket 5 join as you go the rest of the squares will have the same border around them as the first one however some of the chain-spaces will be replaced with slip stitches to join the squares to the blanket begin by adding the border as you did for this first square but stop once you reach a corner that must be joined to the blanket… to join the corners simply replace the chain 1 between the two 3 double_crochet shells of the corner with a slip_stitch there are three different situations that can occur at the corner ● joining to one square simply slip_stitch into the corner of the square picture 1 ● joining to two corners slip_stitch into the space between the two squares picture 2 ● joining to three corners slip_stitch into the corner space of the square that is diagonal to the square that you are joining picture 3 to join the sides for the sides that need to be joined to the blanket replace the chain 1 between the 3 double_crochet shells of the side with a slip_stitch you will slip_stitch between the 3 double_crochet shells of the square that you are joining it to picture 4 6 the border once all the squares are joined a scalloped edge is added around the blanket with the cream insert the yarn into any space between two 3 double_crochet shells of a granny square chain 1 and 5 double_crochet into the space around the outside of the blanket slip_stitch 5 double_crochet into each gap between 3 double_crochet shells and into the corner spaces of the granny squares to finish the blanket slip_stitch into the first chain of the round and fasten_off then the blanket is finished i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you make it and post it on instagram make sure you tag me so i can see it
